# Resource (zitadel_webkey)

Resource representing a web key.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `ecdsa` (Block List, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ecdsa))
- `ed25519` (Block List, Max: 1) Create a ED25519 key pair. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--ed25519))
- `org_id` (String) ID of the organization. If not provided, the organization of the authenticated user/service account is used.
- `rsa` (Block List, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--rsa))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `key_type` (String) Type of the key.
- `state` (String) State of the key.

<a id="nestedblock--ecdsa"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ecdsa`

Optional:

- `curve` (String) Curve of the ECDSA key.


<a id="nestedblock--ed25519"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ed25519`


<a id="nestedblock--rsa"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rsa`

Optional:

- `bits` (String) Bit size of the RSA key.
- `hasher` (String) Signing algorithm used.
